Class PrintController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jfc.print.PrintController

extends java.lang.Object

        public void showPageSetupDialog()
        Display the pageFormat dialog. If the pageFormat is changed, then the setPageFormat(newPageFormat) will be called and will replace the current pageFormat.
